name: HydrosurgeryDebridementICD10PCS
title: Hydrosurgery Debridement (ICD10PCS)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent clinical concepts related to hydrosurgery debridement, a surgical technique that uses a high-pressure water jet to precisely remove necrotic or devitalized tissue from wounds.),(Data Element Scope: This value set encompasses the procedural methodology, clinical indications, and expected outcomes associated with hydrosurgery debridement, supporting its role in effective wound management and enhanced healing.),(Inclusion Criteria: Water jet debridement is required for burns of second degree or above and burns of more than 20% of the total burn area or autologous skin transplantation surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No)
